(slash-resistant [slashres], blunt-resistant [bluntres], pierce-resistant [pierceres], magic-being [magicbeing], inanimate [inanimate], amphibious [amphibian], need-not-eat [neednoteat], mindless [mind], spirit-sight [spiritsight])

item slots [slots]: 2 misc
Mercury is surprisingly easy to animate, being an inherently magical substance associated with change, fluidity and perfection. Apart from being surrounded by noxious fumes, the living mercury is similar to a water elemental and will also shrink when damaged.
